creditline: Gift of Mrs. Erasmus C. Lindley
markings: Labels from verso [archived in object file] | 8134 Decamps / Job et ses amis (handwritten on red bordered label) | 21534-1 / no varnish (handwritten on red bordered label) | Stamp on reverse as in Decamps' Goatherd; [Deforges] ; Decamps could just have bought canvases from him, Deforges not necessarily dealer.
text: This painting once belonged to James J. Hill (1838-1916), the Minnesota railroad magnate whose collection of European paintings forms the basis of the Institute's nineteenth-century holdings.
title: Job and His Friends
